mapper.select: select id, code, name, type_code, technology_code, price, unit_code, biz_type, biz_code, container_code, specimen_code, use_scope_code, doctor_level_code, opeartion_code, insure_list_code, gender_code, min_age, max_age, is_cost, is_stop_same, is_stop_same_not, is_stop_myself, pym, wbm, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from sync_advice where id = #{id}

select id, code, name, type_code, technology_code, price, unit_code, biz_type, biz_code, container_code, specimen_code, use_scope_code, doctor_level_code, opeartion_code, insure_list_code, gender_code, min_age, max_age, is_cost, is_stop_same, is_stop_same_not, is_stop_myself, pym, wbm, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from sync_advice where code in
#{item}

select id, code, name, type_code, technology_code, price, unit_code, biz_type, biz_code, container_code, specimen_code, use_scope_code, doctor_level_code, opeartion_code, insure_list_code, gender_code, min_age, max_age, is_cost, is_stop_same, is_stop_same_not, is_stop_myself, pym, wbm, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from sync_advice
is_valid = '1'
mapper.insert: insert into sync_advice(id, code, name, type_code, technology_code, price, unit_code, biz_type, biz_code, container_code, specimen_code, use_scope_code, doctor_level_code, opeartion_code, insure_list_code, gender_code, min_age, max_age, is_cost, is_stop_same, is_stop_same_not, is_stop_myself, pym, wbm, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values (#{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{typeCode}, #{technologyCode}, #{price}, #{unitCode}, #{bizType}, #{bizCode}, #{containerCode}, #{specimenCode}, #{useScopeCode}, #{doctorLevelCode}, #{opeartionCode}, #{insureListCode}, #{genderCode}, #{minAge}, #{maxAge}, #{isCost}, #{isStopSame}, #{isStopSameNot}, #{isStopMyself}, #{pym}, #{wbm},'1', #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime})
